name: Furniture Test
description:
Have you ever tried assembling a furniture?



Get the chance to build your own and test them all around the house!
From stool, to ladder, to sofa, to fridge and so on..
- Hit the hammer,
- Drill the screws,
- Cut the wood with the saw
Build them properly and have people test them or drop stuff on them!



Earn money if you did a good job to upgrade the house and decorate!



Download now and test your furniture building skills!
